definition.script:
// CD pipeline for JenkinsCI
node {
// Get code from this GitHub repository
stage 'Code Checkout'
checkout([$class: 'GitSCM', branches: [[name: '*/master']], doGenerateSubmoduleConfigurations: false, extensions: [], submoduleCfg: [], userRemoteConfigs: [[credentialsId: 'git-user-credentials', url: '{{ item.response.scmUrl }}']]])
stage 'Configure fhc'
sh 'fhc target {{ rhmap.domain }}'
sh 'fhc login {{ rhmap.username }} {{ rhmap.password }}'
sh 'fhc fhcfg set fhversion 3'
sh 'fhc fhcfg set version 3'
stage 'Trigger client git pull'
sh '/usr/local/bin/fhc git pull {{ item.response.guid }}'
stage 'Build debug android binary'
sh 'fhc build project={{ item.response.projectGuid }} app={{ item.response.guid }} cloud_app={{ item.response.cloudAppGuid }} destination=android download=false config=debug tag=0.0.3' }
